ygData.subject: RE: Brian, please answer...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if it s intentional, why doesn t it just say 123 mana usage? That is SuPREMELY DUMB!
ygData.messageBody:
Well if it's intentional, why doesn't it just say 123 mana usage?

That is SuPREMELY DUMB!


>From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>
>
>This is intentional to balance the power of the spells.
>
>Brian
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
> > Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 2:21 PM
> > To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> > Subject: [shadowknight] Brian, please answer...
> >
> >
> > From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
> >
> > Brian,
> >
> > I've heard rumors that the increased cost of the lifetaps is in
> > fact intentional, and not a bug. Can someone clear this up? I've
> > also heard it's a bug that will be fixed next patch. I'm sure we'd
> > all really appreciate a clear answer on this one.
> >
> > Xilith
> >
>
